dc_description_s: Certified Business Enterprise (“CBE”).  This dataset contains current businesses that are active in the CBE Program.  The program provides preference to District-based firms pursuing District Government issued procurement opportunities  The CBE program process is described on the DSLBD website http://dslbd.dc.gov. ITSA is the District’s method for the procurement of IT Staff Augmentation contractors. OST (Optimal Solutions and Technologies) facilitates the staff augmentation procurement process between District program managers and ITSA-registered vendors. OST has partnered with Peoplefluent to provide a fully-functional Vendor Management System that handles the workflow from beginning to end. The ITSA Project is ISO 9001:2008 compliant.  More information on ITSA is available at http://itsa.ostglobal.com.
dct_spatial_sm: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
dc_title_s: CBEs active in ITSA Program: Washington, D.C.
